tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@
tool.command:
gemini @BINARY@
#if $report.report_selector != 'all': --columns "${report.columns}" #end if
@CMDLN_SQL_FILTER_FILTER_OPTION@
#if int($min_kindreds) > 0: --min-kindreds $min_kindreds #end if
#if str($families) != "": --families $families #end if
$lenient $allow_unaffected
-d $d "${ infile }" > "${ outfile }"
tool.help:
**What it does**
Assuming you have defined the familial relationships between samples when loading your VCF into GEMINI, you can use this tool for identifying de novo (a.k.a spontaneous) mutations that arise in offspring.
